what: TiddlyWiki Field and Title Conventions Utilities
title: TiddlyWiki Field and Title Conventions Utilities
text: ‘TWConventions’ provides utilities encoding enforcing conventions semantic meaning TiddlyWiki tiddler titles, fields, tags. includes functions handle canonical names, alternative names (aka), project-specific inclusion rules, structured assumptions TiddlyWiki content. package allows R scripts projects reliably interpret TiddlyWiki data according standardized conventions without depending transport workflow mechanisms.

title: TiddlyWiki Field and Title Conventions Utilities

what: Get Standard Names for Given Names — standard_name
title: Get Standard Names for Given Names — standard_name
text: function retrieves standard name given name matching TiddlyWiki tiddler titles aliases (aka field). function uses filtering obtain list relevant tiddlers performs matching using tiddler title aka field (contains list alternative tiddler titles). match found, tiddler's title returned standard name.

title: Get Standard Names for Given Names — standard_name
Get Standard Names for Given Names — standard_name
text: names Character string. name find standard form . filter Character string. Filter expression tiddlers. case_sensitive Logical. Whether matching case sensitive. FALSE default.

title: Get Standard Names for Given Names — standard_name
text: Character string. standard name (tiddler title) corresponding   input name, original name match found.

title: Get Standard Names for Given Names — standard_name
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Assuming you have a tiddlers dataset standard_name <- get_standard_name("alternative_name", "[tag[ExampleTag]]") } # }
